nodes.text: HK-01's Droid Army was a militia formed by rogue HK-series assassin droid HK-01 to oppose organic sentient life.

HK-01 and his army started the Great Droid Revolution in 4015 BBY, fighting the Republic and its "superior" organic citizenry. HK and the army met their end when Jedi Master Arca Jeth used a new Force power to stop their violent tirade.
